attributes.action: To build a bridge from the Isle of Sheppy, Kent to Southend-on-Sea, Essex
attributes.background:
Benefits of the bridge:
1. Reduce traffic and pollution in Dartford 
2. More efficient route into Essex for people East of Medway 
3. More efficient route into Kent for people East of Chelmsford 
4. Could increase interest and income for seaside towns
.... and many more benefits!
